website_summaries.verdict: Makes lashes look great in every way, plus it delivers long wear regardless of exposure to moisture. A long-time favorite among those who love both mascara and Dior products.
pros: Does a great job wearing through swimming, showers, tears, and more
Defines while adding volume and length, and holds a curl well for consumers who also use eyelash curlers
cons: Takes a little time to dry on the lashes, yet it tends to dry out in the tube after a few months of use
Several coats are needed for a bold look

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I felt like there's not enough mascara on it. I have to use 3-4 coast to really see the difference on my eyelashes. It does stay long though. Even if I washed it the night before I still wake up the next day with smudges on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: WanderlustSoul

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand of mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of mascara, but this one arrived clumpy & dried out, will purchase from Nordstrom from now on...
customer_reviews.author: ahenderz

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love Diorshow Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara, the only fallback is that it was only available in waterproof. Excellent product! Have used for many years and it never fails me!
customer_reviews.author: Va Breezy1

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: it goes on a bit thick, color is rich black but it does rub off and stained my eye where ever the lash touched. dont last long. comes off easy to.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: First (and ONLY) mascara that didn't end up on my ...
customer_reviews.text: First (and ONLY) mascara that didn't end up on my brow bone! If you have hooded eyes and have an issue with mascara coming off on your brow bone.....THIS is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present for my SO and she loves the stuff... (no i didn't randomly buy it, she mentioned it to me and continues to use it.)
customer_reviews.author: Garce005

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not overjoyed with this product, and it was not waterproof for my needs. I prefer my maybelline waterproof best, and will not buy this product again to expensive and not as presented.
customer_reviews.author: tillygky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the 'Waterproof' mascara. The consistency was very gooey, as if it were very old. I will be going good back to buying the mascara from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good mascara not the best I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: It's a good mascara not the best I have ever tried. It has a big fat brush which is great. I just wished it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rasso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara and what it does for my lashes. However, it does tend to smudge under the eyes. Even the waterproof one. I wear contacts and this is one of the few that I don't have problems with in regards to flaking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Shipment of the items simply took way too long. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: susan cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfeito!!!
customer_reviews.text: A máscara é realmente perfeita....Deixa os cílios bem alongados e nao mancha os olhos, pelo fato de ser a prova dàgua.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Menezes Reis

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but good
customer_reviews.text: I don't like paying brand-name prices for makeup, and I'm generally not a fan of waterproof mascara, but this stuff really hits a sweet spot. One layer gets my lashes to just about where I want them to be, and once it's on, it stays on. So it's just basically dependable and reliable, which I approve of entirely.
customer_reviews.author: M.K. Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive/Overrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at first thinking it's price and brand would knock it out of the park with long wondrous eyelashes. I've got to say, my $7 bottle from the drugstore truly gives me the lashes I was looking for, long wear, smear-free, easy to apply. I think it's the CoverGirl Volublast something or other in the orange tube. The drugstore mascaras are incredible these days, and for me, Diorshow had nothing extra to offer to make it worth the price. I found that it didn't bulk the lashes much unless I spent a lot of time applying layer after layer, and didn't hold the curl as well as my drugstore brand.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara, but my shipment was stale and dried out. I am going to stick to Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: amp10q

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Dior Show for years now. I use it because it volumizes and lasts. My only complaint is it seems to get dry pretty quickly, but I am able to use the same tube for months before that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Monica F

customer_reviews.title: Tossed it in the garbage today. Brands I've been very happy with over ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the most FLAKEY, and also SMEARY, mascara I have ever used (and the most expensive)! Tossed it in the garbage today. Brands I've been very happy with over the years include: Clinique, Shiseido, MAC, Almay, and Mary Kay. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: DDRobin

customer_reviews.title: Not their best product
customer_reviews.text: I usually like this brand of mascara but this specific one runs easily yet is difficult to wash off even with eye make up remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kangaroo

customer_reviews.title: Worst mascara I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I received a defective product but I can't even make it from my makeup table to the front door without having raccoon eyes. After all the research I did to find the best waterproof mascara, I'm extremely disappointed that I spent so much money on a product that does not, in any way, live up to its reputation
customer_reviews.author: K-Sue

customer_reviews.title: The only mascara I use! My hairdresser even asked ...
customer_reviews.text: The only mascara I use! My hairdresser even asked me if I was wearing false eyelashes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dea Lyn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara to date
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara to date. I hate checking on my makeup and this mascara does not give me dusty raccoon eyes by the end of the day like so many of the others. Note is is extremely waterproof and hard to get off with a single cotton ball with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Smolyanskaya

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing. I love that it never runs or clumps. The only reason it did not get a 5 star rating was because it gets too thick just after a month or so. It's expensive and has to be replaced sooner than not, but I am worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This is the #1 mascara in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thickest blackest mascara to come out and really water Proof, even freeze proof in Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: TracyIN Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I ever bought. It does not flake off all over, it actually stays on!
customer_reviews.author: mybag

customer_reviews.title: Like it except for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like it except for the price. Gives feathery lashes, does not extend them. Pretty easy to take off for water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves shadows under your eyes
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula for this. I used to LOVE this mascara, but this new formula leaves smudges/a dark shadow under your eyes. I'll have to find a new mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Darya Ansari

customer_reviews.title: Christian Dior Waterproof Mascara
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara I've ever found. Does not flake off under the eye and does not get on my contacts........Luv it
customer_reviews.author: Schifette

customer_reviews.title: Smudges and makes Racoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: Not in my opinion really waterproof- I found that daily smudges would occur with this expensive mascara, and I remember having no problems with the Loreal "Beauty Tubes" waterproof mascara. Not worth the money- I don't care what other reviewers say, this stuff simply does not stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: My go to mascara. I have tried many waterproof mascaras but this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Picazo

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara goes on clean and black and it stays where you put it until you take it off. Watch that tearjerker without fear of raccoon eyes or black tear tracks running down your face. Your eyes will still look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: PJGyrl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE ONLY MASCARA THAT I CAN WEAR THAT LASTS, DOESN'T SMUDGE, WORKS, MAKES MY LASHES LONGER AND FULLER NATURALLY.. REALLY???? CAN YOU PLEASE OFFER COUPONS OR LOWER PRICES FOR LIFE-LONG CUSTOMERS? THANK YOU SO MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pierotti

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Do not spend your money on this , a drugstore mascara is better than this ... I regret buying it , too bad I didn't save the box it came on so I can return it ...
customer_reviews.author: Veronica J.

customer_reviews.title: old product
customer_reviews.text: the mascara is old. There is no fluid left in the container. had to throw it in the trash since it cannot be returned. Waste of my money. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stubborn Straight Eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I have board straight Asian eyelashes that will not stayed curled unless I use a waterproof mascara, and this one just happens to be my all time favorite for the past 5 years. However... it is OVERPRICED on amazon. The retail price is NOT $38, it's $25 at Sephora, Macys, Nordstrom or where ever you can regularly buy Dior cosmetics. So basically there's no savings by ordering through amazon unless you're counting the cost of gas to get to these places.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: This has been my regular mascara for years, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been my regular mascara for years, but I think the formula has been changed. The last tube I ordered of waterproof was definitely not waterproof (even though it said it on the packaging). I tried it several times and always ended up with mascara and smudges under my eyes by the end of the night. This used to not happen! Sadly, I am on the hunt for another waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: My eyes water a lot and I use waterproof mascara to avoid raccoon eyes. This product does not run so is good for daily use. It doesn't hold up in the shower so is not truly waterproof, but is easier to remove than most waterproof products. Although it is pricey, unlike inexpensive drugstore brands, it lasts for months. I use it daily, several layers for maximum length and I've been using one tube for 3 months and is still going strong. Paired with the Dior serum, it produces spectacular lashes. Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes were made. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I have very straight and short lashes. I bought this for a beach trip and shower tested it. I touched my finger to it and it came off. I tried to wear it as regular mascara too and it was so thin and flakey. It also made my eyes itch. I have had much better results with NYX mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Grace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stack up.
customer_reviews.text: I read the rave reviews for this product, so I ordered it back in April. I wasn't very impressed with the mascara... yep, it made my eyelashes look like I was wearing mascara, but that's about it. On top of that, it doesn't perform well under pressure. This mascara flaked and ran when subjected to standard Texas heat and humidity. If you had given me just the wand and not told me it was $25 Dior mascara, after putting it on I would have sworn it was a generic $3 drug store mascara. I was very disappointed. (If you're looking for a knockout mascara that can take the heat, I am deeply impressed with Maybelline's The Falsies Volum' Express Waterproof.)
customer_reviews.author: alyssa_indigo

customer_reviews.title: works okay
customer_reviews.text: product smears, for the price you would think it would work better, would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: J. digiacomo

product_meta.title: Christian Dior Diorshow Waterproof Mascara, No. 090 Black, 0.38 Ounce
product_meta.description: A waterproof version for long-lasting effect. Effectively thickens. prolongs and curves lashes. Gives your lashes fullness. length and volume. A must-have item for creating a glamorous look.
feature_bullets: A waterproof version for long-lasting effect
Effectively thickens, prolongs and curves lashes
Gives your lashes fullness, length and volume
